definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
Wu Jianhao or Vanness Wu (1978-), Taiwan pop star and actor, F4 band member

sentences.english: That’s why Howell was never caught.
sentences.chinese: 這就是豪厄爾從未失手的原因。

sentences.english: Today was the classmates to all go home the whole dormitory to leave me on Saturday, stone with Hao.
sentences.chinese: 明天同學們都回家了宿舍啊分開我在星期六啊石與豪。

sentences.english: He also said he was proud of his parenting skills.
sentences.chinese: 他也很以他的育兒經爲豪。

sentences.english: A study of Qin Zihao's modernist poetry.
A：How did it go this afternoon at your meeting?
sentences.chinese: 陳豪下午在走廊上又遇到Amy。

sentences.english: One of his friends, Howells called him "Lincoln of our literature" and a literary critic, H. L.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友豪威爾斯稱他爲“我們文學中的林肯”。

sentences.english: It was the most insanely erotic moment of Howell’s life.
sentences.chinese: 那是豪厄爾一生當中最爲瘋狂銷魂的片刻時光。

sentences.english: Howell was in misery. She’d robbed him of whatever little thunder he had left.
sentences.chinese: 豪厄爾痛苦地聽着，她把他所剩不多的光芒都奪走了。

sentences.english: The voices he heard in the Bronx never had Naomi’s lilt.
sentences.chinese: 豪厄爾從未在布朗克斯聽到過如此輕快優雅的說話聲。

sentences.english: People in Quanzhou are proud of Qingyuan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 泉州的人以清源山爲豪。

sentences.english: I think you must be proud of being a part of such a great company.
sentences.chinese: 我想你們一定會以成爲這樣大公司的一員而爲豪。

sentences.english: She was the reason he’d drifted back to this land of desolation.
sentences.chinese: 就是爲了她，豪厄爾纔不知不覺回到這片荒涼的土地。

sentences.english: In Han Dynasty, elite class included merchant elite and township elites.
sentences.chinese: 漢代豪民在類型上可大致劃分爲工商豪民和鄉里豪民。

sentences.english: "What does that mean?" Howe asked belligerently.
sentences.chinese: “你這是什麼意思？”豪挑釁性地問。

sentences.english: Calhoun had been too ill to hear Clay's speech.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾豪由於病太重而沒有聽到克萊的演講。

definition: to dazzle/to boast/to show off/(slang) cool/awesome
Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur
